Verses: 1 aasaa Arasaanda Muppaththaaraam Varushaththile, Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Paashaa Yoodhaavukku Virodhamaai Vandhu, Oruvarum Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasaavinidaththil Pokkum Varaththumaayiraadhadikku Raamaavaik Kattinaan.

2 appozhudhu Aasaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththilum Raajaavin Aramanaiyilumulla Pokkishangalilulla Velliyum Ponnum Eduththu, Thamaskuvil Vaasampannugira Penaadhaadh Ennum Seeriyaavin Raajaavinidaththukku Anuppi:

3 enakkum Umakkum, En Thagappanukkum Ummudaiya Thagappanukkum Udanpadikkai Unde; Idho, Velliyum Ponnum Umakku Anuppinen; Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Paashaa Ennaivittuvilagippogumpadikku Neer Vandhu, Avanodu Seydha Udanpadikkaiyaith Thallippodum Endru Solli Anuppinaan.

4 penaadhaadh Raajaavaagiya Aasaavukku Sevikoduththu, Thanakku Undaana Senaapadhigalai Isravelin Pattanangalukku Virodhamaaga Anuppinaan; Avargal Eeyonaiyum, Thaanaiyum, Aabelmaayeemaiyum, Napthali Pattanangalin Ellaap Pandagasaalaigalaiyum Muriya Adiththaargal.
5 idhaip Paashaa Kettapodhu, Raamaavaik Kattugiradhai Niruththi, Than Velaiyaivittu Ozhindhaan.
6 appozhudhu Raajaavaagiya Aasaa Yoodhaa Anaiththaiyun Koottikkondupoi, Paashaa Kattina Raamaavin Karkalaiyum Adhin Marangalaiyum Eduththuvandhu, Avaigalaal Kebaavaiyum Mispaavaiyum Kattinaan.

7 akkaalaththile Gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya Anaani Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasaavinidaththil Vandhu, Avanai Nokki: Neer Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Saarndhukollaamal, Seeriyaavin Raajaavai Saarndhukondapadiyinaal, Seeriyaa Raajaavin Raanuvam Umadhu Kaikkuth Thappippoyitru.

8 migavum Eraalamaana Radhangalum Kudhiraiveerarumulla Eththiyoppiyarum Loobiyarum Magaa Senaiyaayirundhaargalallavaa? Neer Karththarai Saarndhukondapodhovenil, Avargalai Umadhu Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaare.

9 thammaippatri Uththama Irudhayaththodirukkiravargalukkuth Thammudaiya Vallamaiyai Vilangappannumpadi, Karththarudaiya Kangal Boomiyengum Ulaavikkondirukkiradhu; Indha Vishayaththil Madhiyillaadhavaraayirundheer; Aagaiyaal Idhumudharkondu Umakku Yuththangal Neridum Endraan.
10 adhinimiththam Aasaa Gnaanadhrushtikkaaranmel Sinandhu Kadunkobankondu Avanaik Kaavalaraiyile Vaiththaan; Idhallaamalum Akkaalaththil Janangalukkul Silaraik Kodooramaai Nadappiththaan.
11 aasaavin Aadhiyodandhamaana Nadapadigalellaam Yoodhaavaiyum Isravelaiyum Serndha Raajaakkalin Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
12 aasaa Arasaanda Muppaththonbadhaam Varushaththile Than Kaalgalil Vyaadhikandu, Avan Novu Migavum Ukkiramaayirundhadhu; Avan Than Vyaadhiyilumkarththarai Alla, Parigaarigalaiye Thedinaan.
13 aasaa Thaan Arasaanda Naarpaththoraam Varushaththil Mariththu, Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhaan.

14 thailakkaararaal Seyyappatta Kandhavarkkangalinaalum Parimalangalinaalum Niraindha Oru Meththaiyinmel Avanai Valarththi, Avanukkaaga Vegu Thiralaana Kandhavarkkangalaik Koluththina Pinbu, Avan Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Thanakku Vettivaiththirundha Avanudaiya Kallaraiyile, Avanai Adakkampanninaargal.
